title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body:
Hello fellow players! 
I've been having issues with my LoL Client for a couple weeks now. 
It used to take me multiple tries of launching and relaunching to get the launcher to open, even then only sometimes taking me to the login screen. 
I have tried running it as an admin (including setting it to launch ONLY as admin, ever),
I have also tried replacing the ' rads_user_kernel ' file, but that hasnt helped either. 

Although half the time it doesn't work at all, the other half of the time I get the error message 'PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working.' 


Can someone please suggest something I haven't already tried?
Please and thank you!!!
